name: Edit Compliance Record - Alliant Admin
description: Alliant Admin users can edit compliance records from the list view with full editing permissions including Requirements tab access

background.text: I am on the compliance dashboard
I am logged in as an Alliant Admin user
there are existing compliance records in the list

scenarios.name: Successfully edit compliance record via pencil icon

steps.text: I can see compliance records in the list view
I click the Edit button for a compliance record
I should navigate to the compliance record form in edit mode
the form should be pre-filled with existing data
all form fields should be editable
the Requirements tab should be visible and editable
I am editing a compliance record
I modify the compliance details
I click the Save button
I should see the message "Compliance record updated successfully"
I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard list view
the updated data should reflect in the list view

scenarios.name: Successfully edit requirements tab as Alliant Admin

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I navigate to the Requirements tab
the Requirements tab should be editable
I modify requirement details
I click the Save button
I should see the message "Compliance record updated successfully"

scenarios.name: Cancel edit operation returns to dashboard

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I modify some fields
I click the Cancel button
I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
the changes should not be saved
the original data should remain unchanged

scenarios.name: Edit form displays Save and Cancel buttons

steps.text: I click the Edit button for a compliance record
the edit form loads
I should see the Save button
I should see the Cancel button
both buttons should be clickable

scenarios.name: Updated compliance record reflects in Client Admin view

steps.text: I have successfully updated a compliance record
a Client Admin user views the same record
the updated data should be visible
the Requirements tab should remain non-editable for Client Admin

scenarios.name: Validation error prevents saving invalid data

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I clear a required field
I click the Save button
I should see a validation error message
the form should not be saved
I should remain on the edit form
I attempt to edit a compliance record that has been deleted
I click the Edit button
I should see an error message
I should not be able to access the edit form
I am editing a compliance record
I modify the compliance details
I click the Save button
the server returns an error
I should see an error message
I should remain on the edit form
my changes should be preserved

scenarios.name: Form validation with empty required fields

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I clear all required fields
I attempt to save
I should see validation errors for each required field
the save operation should be prevented

scenarios.name: Edit record with maximum field length data

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I enter maximum allowed characters in text fields
I click the Save button
the data should be saved successfully
I should see the success message

scenarios.name: Edit record with minimum valid data

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I enter minimum required data in all fields
I click the Save button
the record should be saved successfully
I should see the success message

scenarios.name: Edit record with special characters in text fields

steps.text: I am editing a compliance record
I enter special characters in text fields
I save the record
the special characters should be preserved correctly
the data should display properly in the list view

gherkin_content:
Feature: Edit Compliance Record - Alliant Admin
  Alliant Admin users can edit compliance records from the list view with full editing permissions including Requirements tab access

  Background:
    Given I am on the compliance dashboard
    And I am logged in as an Alliant Admin user
    And there are existing compliance records in the list

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully edit compliance record via pencil icon
    Given I can see compliance records in the list view
    When I click the Edit button for a compliance record
    Then I should navigate to the compliance record form in edit mode
    And the form should be pre-filled with existing data
    And all form fields should be editable
    And the Requirements tab should be visible and editable

  @positive @core
  Scenario: Successfully save edited compliance record
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I modify the compliance details
    And I click the Save button
    Then I should see the message "Compliance record updated successfully"
    And I should be redirected to the Compliance Dashboard list view
    And the updated data should reflect in the list view

  @positive @requirements
  Scenario: Successfully edit requirements tab as Alliant Admin
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I navigate to the Requirements tab
    Then the Requirements tab should be editable
    When I modify requirement details
    And I click the Save button
    Then I should see the message "Compliance record updated successfully"

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: Cancel edit operation returns to dashboard
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I modify some fields
    And I click the Cancel button
    Then I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
    And the changes should not be saved
    And the original data should remain unchanged

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Edit form displays Save and Cancel buttons
    Given I click the Edit button for a compliance record
    When the edit form loads
    Then I should see the Save button
    And I should see the Cancel button
    And both buttons should be clickable

  @positive @integration
  Scenario: Updated compliance record reflects in Client Admin view
    Given I have successfully updated a compliance record
    When a Client Admin user views the same record
    Then the updated data should be visible
    But the Requirements tab should remain non-editable for Client Admin

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Validation error prevents saving invalid data
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I clear a required field
    And I click the Save button
    Then I should see a validation error message
    And the form should not be saved
    And I should remain on the edit form

  @negative @error
  Scenario: Cannot edit non-existent compliance record
    Given I attempt to edit a compliance record that has been deleted
    When I click the Edit button
    Then I should see an error message
    And I should not be able to access the edit form

  @negative @error
  Scenario: Save fails with server error
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I modify the compliance details
    And I click the Save button
    And the server returns an error
    Then I should see an error message
    And I should remain on the edit form
    And my changes should be preserved

  @negative @validation
  Scenario: Form validation with empty required fields
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I clear all required fields
    And I attempt to save
    Then I should see validation errors for each required field
    And the save operation should be prevented

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Edit record with maximum field length data
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I enter maximum allowed characters in text fields
    And I click the Save button
    Then the data should be saved successfully
    And I should see the success message

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Edit record with minimum valid data
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I enter minimum required data in all fields
    And I click the Save button
    Then the record should be saved successfully
    And I should see the success message

  @edge-case @data
  Scenario: Edit record with special characters in text fields
    Given I am editing a compliance record
    When I enter special characters in text fields
    And I save the record
    Then the special characters should be preserved correctly
    And the data should display properly in the list view
